about_the_game:
Design a fully-personalised Secret Agent, and watch them feature as a central character in every player's version of the game.



Become a legendary force and make your Agent an unforgettable part of the ATS gameplay experience. Are you ready to join the ranks of elite secret agents and forge your own legacy? You'll decide every aspect of your Agent's build, including their...

  • Name
  • Nationality
  • Appearance
  • Stats
  • Backstory

Let your creativity run wild!!



This DLC also Includes:

  • An in-game Agent Designer
  • Campaign Season Pass (All past and future 'Campaign Store' Campaigns Instantly Unlocked)
  • Agent Season Pass (All past and future Custom & Missed Loyalty Agents Instantly Unlocked)
  • 500 Bonus Gems
  • An array of Gold Mission Items
  • and more...

What are you waiting for? Check out the 'Your Agent in the Game' DLC today, and leave your mark on the Video Gaming World!

In addition to the cool in-game perks, purchasing this DLC is a fantastic way to go the extra mile to help support the Developer's work on future updates and projects.
